detailsData.title: Prior Business Experience
detailsData.content: Almost every member of our team has prior experience in the business world as a business owner/entrepreneur, C-level executive, and/or part of a senior management team. Certain team members hold graduate degrees in business (e.g. MBA), in addition to their JDs.

detailsData.title: Proactive Client Understanding
detailsData.content: We take a practical approach to practicing law by not only focusing on legal issues, but more importantly from a business perspective, provide practical business advice. We invest the time to understand our clients and their particular needs, goals, and objectives.

detailsData.title: Experienced Lawyers
detailsData.content: Our model focuses on having a team consisting of seasoned business attorneys with the background and knowledge to understand and solve our clients’ most complex issues. We do not rely on junior and mid-level attorneys for the bulk of the heavy lifting.

detailsData.title: Quarterbacking
detailsData.content: For areas outside of our core practice, we serve to the legal market what a great quarterback is to a winning football team. We utilize strategic relationships with other law firms to partner with the best lawyers for the job, eliminating inherent conflicts.

address: 8 Park Center Court, Suite 100, Baltimore, Maryland 21117
valueProp: A unique business boutique law firm, notably comprised of former “big firm” attorneys. Fixated on delivering exceptional outcomes specifically geared to middle-market companies, entrepreneurs, private equity and venture capital firms and other stakeholders -- by applying a disciplined and time-tested “results-oriented, value-add approach” to solving our clients' most complex legal, business, and often life-changing issues.

testimonalData.text: Zarren Law Group provided exceptional service and practical business advice that helped us navigate complex legal issues.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Their proactive approach and deep understanding of our business needs set them apart from other firms.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: The team at Zarren Law Group is knowledgeable, experienced, and always available to provide guidance.
testimonalData.author: Michael Johnson
